A **NBA Data Scientist** is a role in a sports organization that helps create *solutions* to help a team win using data driven analysis (<https://tech.co/news/data-scientist-basketball-phoenix-2017-04>). This job consists of collecting data on other teams to see tendencies. It also includes putting entensive reports together to help coaches create a gameplan to increase win rate. This job usually encludes you working with other data scientists as a team to increase productivity.
